title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: When trying to copy a package in the project Ae using the package viewer, the destination is being displayed as 'xxx' instead of 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'. This behavior is observed in jdt.ui3.
OB: When attempting to copy a package in project Ae using the package viewer, the destination is displayed as 'xxx'.
EB: The destination should be displayed as 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new project 'xxx2'. 
2. In the package viewer, select a package in project Ae. 
3. From the context menu, choose 'copy'.
